scripts.compile: pnpm run compile:receiver && npm run compile:processor
scripts.deploy:receiver: pnpm run compile:receiver && cd dist/receiver && zip -r ../lambda.zip index.js && cd .. && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name bt-lalamove-webhook-v2 --zip-file fileb://./lambda.zip
scripts.deploy:processor: pnpm run compile:processor && cd dist/processor && zip -r ../lambda.zip index.js && cd .. && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name bt-lalamove-webhook-processor --zip-file fileb://./lambda.zip
